jcr:root.courseContent: Ability to perform a range of work activities, some of which are non routine and complex in a variety of contexts Â The knowledge acquired is mainly factual or procedural with some understanding of relationships and associations Â Work activities comprise tasks employing higher skills sets mainly undertaken by frontline supervisors involving some accountability within specified boundaries Â Activities are carried out under frequent supervision requiring some judgment or reasoning"
jcr:root.courseObjective: This objective of this qualification is to learners with the skills and knowledge required to work in the Senior Services sub sector of the Community and Social Services Sector at a WSQ Level 2 position.
jcr:root.courseTitle: Assist Clients with Personal Hygiene and Grooming 1
